majorArcana.name: The Fool
majorArcana.upright: New beginnings, faith in the future, taking risks, following your heart
majorArcana.reversed: Recklessness, carelessness, hesitation, holding back

majorArcana.name: The Magician
majorArcana.upright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, inspired action, power
majorArcana.reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents

majorArcana.name: The High Priestess
majorArcana.upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind
majorArcana.reversed: Secrets, disconnection from intuition, withdrawn, repressed feelings

majorArcana.name: The Empress
majorArcana.upright: Femininity, beauty, nurturing, abundance, fertility
majorArcana.reversed: Creative block, dependence, emptiness, smothering

majorArcana.name: The Emperor
majorArcana.upright: Authority, structure, leadership, stability, father figure
majorArcana.reversed: Domination, excessive control, rigidity, inflexibility

majorArcana.name: The Hierophant
majorArcana.upright: Spiritual wisdom, tradition, conformity, morality, ethics
majorArcana.reversed: Rebellion, challenging conventions, new approaches

majorArcana.name: The Lovers
majorArcana.upright: Love, harmony, relationships, value alignment, choices
majorArcana.reversed: Disharmony, misalignment, imbalance, discord

majorArcana.name: The Chariot
majorArcana.upright: Control, willpower, success, action, determination
majorArcana.reversed: Self-discipline issues, opposition, lack of direction

majorArcana.name: Strength
majorArcana.upright: Courage, inner strength, compassion, persuasion, influence
majorArcana.reversed: Self-doubt, weakness, insecurity, low energy

majorArcana.name: The Hermit
majorArcana.upright: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance
majorArcana.reversed: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal, regression

majorArcana.name: Wheel of Fortune
majorArcana.upright: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point
majorArcana.reversed: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles

majorArcana.name: Justice
majorArcana.upright: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
majorArcana.reversed: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty

majorArcana.name: The Hanged Man
majorArcana.upright: Surrender, new perspective, enlightenment, letting go
majorArcana.reversed: Resistance, stalling, indecision, delays

majorArcana.name: Death
majorArcana.upright: Endings, change, transformation, transition
majorArcana.reversed: Resistance to change, inability to move on, stagnation

majorArcana.name: Temperance
majorArcana.upright: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose, meaning
majorArcana.reversed: Imbalance, excess, lack of harmony, impatience

majorArcana.name: The Devil
majorArcana.upright: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, materialism, sexuality
majorArcana.reversed: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment

majorArcana.name: The Tower
majorArcana.upright: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
majorArcana.reversed: Fear of change, avoiding disaster, delaying inevitable

majorArcana.name: The Star
majorArcana.upright: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality
majorArcana.reversed: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust issues, disconnection

majorArcana.name: The Moon
majorArcana.upright: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition
majorArcana.reversed: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion

majorArcana.name: The Sun
majorArcana.upright: Positivity, success, joy, vitality, enlightenment
majorArcana.reversed: Temporary depression, lack of success, negativity

majorArcana.name: Judgement
majorArcana.upright: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, absolution
majorArcana.reversed: Self-doubt, lack of self-awareness, failure to learn lessons

majorArcana.name: The World
majorArcana.upright: Completion, integration, accomplishment, travel
majorArcana.reversed: Seeking personal closure, lack of completion, stagnation

wands.themes: Energy, passion, creativity, action, inspiration, spirituality

cups.themes: Emotions, feelings, relationships, intuition, inner world

swords.themes: Intellect, thought, reason, communication, conflict, truth

pentacles.themes: Material world, money, career, physical reality, practicality

threeCard.name: Three Card Spread
threeCard.description: A simple but powerful spread that examines the flow of time in a situation.

celticCross.name: Celtic Cross
celticCross.description: A complex and thorough spread that examines many aspects of a situation.

relationship.name: Relationship Spread
relationship.description: Examines the dynamics between two people and the relationship itself.
